ca.mcgill.ecse211.odometry

Class OdometryCorrection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.odometry.OdometryCorrection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OdometryCorrection
extends java.lang.Thread
    Provides correction to the odometer based on light sensor data.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Team 2
